entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 a.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 7:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C

Visibility: 16 km

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
